html:
1.16.18  5:03 pm   How do I know if I'm loved?

     you are

1.16.18  5:03 pm   when will the new song be out on Google play

     it won't be. they merged with youtube music, and i always skip youtube music, to avoid any pandemonium that may ensue resulting in conflicts with my youtube channel. i'm not really sure what happens when you upload to youtube music, although i've been meaning to figure it out

1.16.18  4:59 pm   do you have any intention of making another really long video (longer than 10 minutes) like HOTEWIG?

     that takes an insanely long time. last time i did it, by the time i was done, everyone i knew was dead, from old age

1.16.18  4:57 pm   I WANT AN UMBRELLA SHIRT

     i think there are some here

1.16.18  4:55 pm   how happy are you?

     i'd say about a 6.3

1.16.18  4:51 pm   Do you feel like the internet has had a good influence on society?

     yes

1.16.18  4:51 pm   how big should be my house?

     maybe 3 times as big as you?

1.16.18  4:47 pm   what does cool mean to you?

     ok

1.16.18  4:45 pm   Do you believe in magic?

     everything is magic

1.16.18  4:40 pm   how do you write music

     i just think of how i want it to go, and tell myself (and save me telling myself)

1.16.18  4:35 pm   what is pi?

     how far around compared to how far out

1.16.18  4:32 pm   Is there a hidden meaning in the phrase"La de da de da de da de day oh" or can I take it however I want? 

     it means singing. you know, like singing

1.16.18  4:31 pm   What do you think of your new song? Put it on a scale [suggested scale 64-93 billion  or maybe 16-23] 

     i already forgot how it goes

1.16.18  4:26 pm   How can I have better imagination?

     it's already pretty good

1.16.18  4:22 pm   I have big, ambitious ideas: (not too big, but pretty big for 1 person), but never actually do any of them (procrastination, lack of patience, short attention span etc). What do I do?

     start with slightly smaller ideas

1.16.18  4:19 pm   how do i get my parents to stop yelling at each other all the god darn time

     yell at them?

1.16.18  4:15 pm   Where did all the good times go?

     all around you, right now. that's where they went

1.16.18  4:12 pm   How'd you play that sick keyboard solo in your new video?

     using my hands

1.16.18  4:11 pm   In this moment, I feel like I could live forever.

     ah, #relatable

1.16.18  4:10 pm   how long did "La de da de da de da de day oh" take to make

     longer than i wish

1.16.18  4:09 pm   do you love satan

     i actually don't know anyone named satan

1.16.18  4:03 pm   Do you believe in ghosts?

     i'm beginning to think i am the ghosts

1.16.18  4:00 pm   If you like history so much, why don't you invent history 2?

     we all do it, every day

1.16.18  3:55 pm   can you please start a global movement to form a black hole and destroy everything?

     i will do it when i get a chance

1.16.18  3:55 pm   How did you feel about implementing a few clips of (possibly) you singing into this new video? Did it increase the amount of time it took to make it?

     i've sung in almost every video i've every made

1.16.18  3:54 pm   do you ever cry when listening to music because it's so beautiful or moving?

     yes, and also other things

1.16.18  3:53 pm   will you come on the H3 podcast?

     are you them

1.16.18  3:51 pm   what do you think will be the end of humanity

     perhaps some kind of level-up

1.16.18  3:49 pm   The new video is out.

     ok i will check it out

1.16.18  3:43 pm   Can you ask yourself a question using this page? 

     yes but i never do

1.16.18  3:43 pm   If heat rises why are mountains cold at the top -- and does this have anything to do with patriarchy? (Hint: yes)

     no

1.16.18  3:11 pm   are you working on your next thing right now?

     you'll never believe this, but at the moment you asked this i was in between things

1.16.18  3:04 pm   why is the im feeling randy button so small

     to make it more difficult for you to find it

1.16.18  2:39 pm   what do you think about women?

     everything

1.16.18  2:03 pm   Do you, or have you in the past, regularly watched any Star Trek series?  If so, which, and did you find any more interesting or enjoyable than the others?  They are all interesting/enjoyable (or not) for different reasons, I suppose a more appropriate question then would be did one catch your attention more so than others, and if so which?

     i have only seen djo, which may or may not be as good as the regular

1.16.18  1:39 pm   how do you feel about melodicas?

     ok

     would you consider getting a melodica if you don't have one already?

     where i come from it is raining melodicas, and has been for some time. it isn't necessary to ever buy one, actually what i could use is an umbrella, to protect against all the melodicas

1.16.18  1:34 pm   I'm trying to write out some music... how would you write out something where you hold out notes, but add notes on top? Like for example if I wanted to play like a Cmaj appergio, playing the C on beat 1, E on 2, G on 3 and C and 4.. but I want the notes held out (so a whole note on C, dotted half note on E, etc)? When I plug a whole note into my software it doesn't let me add any other notes because I think the software thinks that I want to add the notes after 4 beats of the whole note and not while it's ringing out, but maybe I'm writing it wrong. How would you write that out (by hand)?

     i can think of 3 ways, none of which are that great. make like 4 parallel universes, and put everybody's notes and rests in, as if there are 4 players sort of borrowing the same staff. if you want to convince a music program to do that, try making different 'voices'? it's a hassle, that's why handwriting is always easier. the next choice would be to tie everything over, and it would look like bigger and bigger stacks. this would be accurate but kind of a mess to read at first glance because it looks like stacked chords. and of course the other way is to just write 4 quarter notes going up and then write something on the top like "sustain" or "please don't let go" or something

1.16.18  1:27 pm   did you ever realise that sleeping in a bed is like a cool time travelling device to breakfast

     that's true but you can make the breakfast time travel too, by eating it before bed

1.16.18  1:25 pm   are you incomplete?

     yes and no

1.16.18  1:13 pm   When you play tic-tac-toe do you prefer to be X's or O's? 

     i prefer to be the board

1.16.18  1:10 pm   1.15.18  9:12 pm after you fire yourself, do you have to re-apply and convince the boss (also you) that you are a good worker and will get the job done?

     yes, and he doesn't always believe me

     Or do you just hire yourself back right away? 

     i have no choice, i'm the only person available

1.16.18  1:03 pm   Can you count to zero?

     doesn't seem necessary

1.16.18  12:48 pm   do you feel passion? 

     yes

1.16.18  12:34 pm   at what time will you be uploading the new video?

     about 20:23 gmt

1.16.18  9:47 am   Do you like playing games? 

     yes

1.16.18  9:20 am   Is your new video out?

     i will check

1.16.18  6:04 am   Will u be my GODFATHER?

     i will try, first i have to figure out what that is

1.16.18  5:51 am   The month and year are January 2019. bill wurtz  has been working diligently each day for hours on end on the same music video for a year and 3 months

     that's not true

1.16.18  3:45 am   Would/have you ever written a play?

     nowadays i can write and perform the entire play and post it online

1.16.18  3:10 am   When does the next video online?

     today
